recommended_degree: Film, Produksi Film dan Televisi, Film dan Televisi, Desain Komunikasi Visual, BroadBand Multimedia (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Requirements:
1. Final-year student or fresh graduate in Film, Broadcasting, Visual Communication Design, or related major.
2. Basic knowledge of camera operation, composition, and cinematography principles.
3. Familiar with production equipment and shooting environments.
4. Portfolio of previous film or video projects (academic or freelance).
5. Passionate about visual storytelling and advertising production.
6. Detail-oriented, adaptive, and open to feedback in a fast-paced creative environment.

Job Descriptions:
1. Assist with camera setup, lens changes, lighting arrangement, and scene blocking.
2. Operate supporting equipment such as gimbals, sliders, and light kits under supervision.
3. Support in location scouting, equipment checklists, and set coordination.
4. Capture behind-the-scenes (BTS) footage and document production processes.
5. Assist editors during post-production with logging, footage organization, and basic color reference.
6. Collaborate with creative and art teams to align visual tone with brand direction.
7. Hands-on experience with DSLR/Mirrorless cameras (Sony, Canon, etc.).
8. Learn basic lighting setups (three-point lighting, key-fill-back) and exposure control.
9. Exposure to Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or Final Cut Pro workflows.
10. On-set training on frame composition, camera movement, and visual continuity.
